price: 我从他们族中派了一个使者，去教化他们（说）：“你们应当崇拜安拉，除了他，你们绝无应受崇拜者，难道你们不敬畏吗？”
arabic: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا فِيهِمۡ رَسُولٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مَا لَكُم مِّنۡ إِلَٰهٍ غَيۡرُهُۥٓۚ أَفَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-arsalnā fīhim rasūlan min'hum ani uʿ'budū al-laha mā lakum min ilāhin ghayruhu afalā tattaqūna
